titleStmt.title: A commentary: or, sermons vpon the second chapter of the first epistle of Saint Peter vvherein method, sense, doctrine, and vse, is, with great variety of matter, profitably handled; and sundry heads of diuinity largely discussed. By Nicholas Byfield, late preacher of God's Word at Isle-worth in Middlesex.
titleStmt.author: Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622.
Gouge, William, 1578-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Humfrey Lownes for George Latham, and are to be sould at his shop in Paul's Church-yard, at the signe of the brazen Serpent,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paul's Church-yard, at the signe of the brazen Serpent
